segments.text: Have you had any experience with sales work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . In fact , I had worked for a foreign trade company for nearly two years , where I established business ties with several firms .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What exactly did you do at that company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Visit customers , dispatch consignments and things like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But when and why did you leave the company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I left it two months ago . I didn't think I could learn much there , and there were not many opportunities for self-development .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Why did you choose our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been informed that there are many opportunities to develop myself in your company . Besides , I grew up in a city in the Northeast . I have lots of acquaintances in the region , which might help to push sales .
segments.speaker: S2
